title: 正版验证失败
author: Alorw
txt_content:
Bungee 输出错误，
[07:58:52] [Netty Worker IO Thread #0/ERROR]: Error authenticating Arasple with minecraft.net
io.netty.channel.ConnectTimeoutException: connection timed out: sessionserver.mojang.com/52.85.149.166:443
        at io.netty.channel.nio.AbstractNioChannel$AbstractNioUnsafe$1.run(AbstractNioChannel.java:267) [WaterFall.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.12-SNAPSHOT:87b23b8:165]

复制代码


服务器能够正常Ping到Mojang的验证服务器
